item.title: About
item.description: Hello! Thanks for stopping by! I’m currently a postdoctoral researcher at the NCSA , which is a part of the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign . I work in the DXL group on the open-source data analysis and visualization code yt . I received my PhD in physics from the University of Notre Dame , where I used cosmological simulations to study dark energy , the structure of the cosmic web , and the Lyman $\alpha$ Forest under Dr.
